item.title: 1: Kobe Bryant's Jerseys Retired for Lakers
item.description:
Welcome to the first episode of The Rebound, a podcast where the fans talk about the NBA.

item.title: 2: Carmelo Anthony traded from New York Knicks to Oklahoma City Thunder
item.description:
Welcome to the second episode of The Rebound, a podcast where the fans talk about the NBA.

Links

  • Facebook
  • Twitter
  • Instagram
  • YouTube
item.itunes:summary: The New York Knicks finally move on from Carmelo Anthony and trade him to the Oklahoma City Thunder for Enes Kanter, Doug McDermott, and a 2018 second round draft pick.
item.itunes:author: Victor Kernes
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to the second episode of The Rebound, a podcast where the fans talk about the NBA.

item.itunes:summary: After waiting all summer long, Russell Westbrook finally signs a 5 year max extension offer with the Oklahoma City Thunder and commits long term to the team.
